name: Slimey's Story (itch)
description: Slimey's Story is a project I've been working on for quite some time. Some fellow classmates told me about itch.io and I followed their advice. I think this game is absolutely fun. I love the controls, the puzzles, textures and design. Seriously if you're bored and you're cool with spending your time playing this game I can assure you, you'll have fun. I plan to release it on Steam with multiplayer in the near future.
